author: Christianna Silva
title: One In Five LGBTQ+ People Are Already ‘Much Worse Off’ Financially Because Of Coronavirus
description: A new report shows that LGBTQ+ people are more likely to have experienced a cut in work hours, with 30 percent of LGBTQ+ respondents experiencing a cut in comparison to 22 percent of the general population. They are nearly twice as likely as the general popul…
content: In the weeks following the outbreak of the novel coronavirus in the United States, millions of people have lost their jobs, had their hours cut, and felt the heavy impact a pandemic can have on their economic freedom and LGBTQ+ Americans are among those who a… [+2225 chars]
